projects.title: Pet Care Portal
projects.bodyText: A MERN stack based project for pet care use case that allows users to book doctors and supplies for their pets hosted on AWS EC2 coupled with MongoDB Atlas.

projects.title: Quizzie - Quiz Portal
projects.bodyText: The educational quiz platform uses React.js (Vite) for frontend, Node.js with Express for backend, MongoDB Atlas for database, JWT Token for authentication, Bcrypt for encryption, Tailwind CSS for styling, and is deployed on AWS EC2.

projects.title: Movie Ticket Booking System
projects.bodyText: A web-based System developed using Java Servlets, JSP, Oracle, and Web technologies for user-friendly online ticket booking.

projects.title: RF Technology for Dynamic Vehicle Speed Detection
projects.bodyText: Research-based on IOT technology to implement vehicular laws by detecting law breakers using a novel RFID-based mechanism sampling data directly from a car’s OBD interface published as a journal article.

projects.title: Prostate Cancer Patient Classification using ML Algorithms
projects.bodyText: A comparative study of ML algorithms that are used to classify cancerous patients using models like Random Forest, SVM, and KNN.

projects.title: Audio/Video Transcriber and Summarizer
projects.bodyText: A python-based data transcriber that uses OpenAI’s Whisper API to transcribe the input file and a Natural Language Toolkit to summarise it.
